chart_param_json.plot_js: (function(node, data) { var chart = new G2.Chart({ container: node, forceFit: true, height: window.innerHeight }); chart.source(data); chart.scale('value', { min: 0 }); chart.scale('year', { range: [0, 1] }); chart.tooltip({ crosshairs: { type: 'line' } }); chart.line().position('year*value'); chart.point().position('year*value').size(4).shape('circle').style({ stroke: '#fff', lineWidth: 1 }); chart.render(); })

(function(node, data) { var chart = new G2.Chart({ container: node, forceFit: true, height: window.innerHeight }); chart.source(data); chart.scale('sales', { tickInterval: 20 }); chart.interval().position('year*sales'); chart.render(); })
